5,6:
move up
向上移动

He’s been moved up to the position of manager.
Interest rates are beginning to move up.

6,7:
An 82
一辆82年制造的车.

I'd like a bottle of red wine. an 65 please.
我要瓶红酒, 要65年的.

3:
remark=n 评论
remarkable=adj 值得评论的, 说明是很棒的

1,2,3:
we're just looking
我们只是看看, 并未打算买

-Can I help you(店员问你要点什么)
-I'm just looking.

6:
service=n 服务
service=v 服务一辆车, 给车保养

service a car
how often do you service your car?

1,2,3,4,5:
Was it always this color?
一直是这个颜色吗

改为陈述句就是
It was always this color.
It was always blue.

1,2:
except after
除了在XX之后以外,
注意这里的介词after表示在...之后, 如果要表示的含义就换介词.

I don't usually go to bars, except after a long day's work. 

I don't get up late, except on Sundays.

6,7,8,9:
many more to go.
还有很多里要跑.
more是more miles的省略.

I've visited a lot of places. There are many more to visit.
I have much more to learn

注意如果是不可数就用much more

3,4,5,6:
the funny thing is
有趣的事情是, 常常用于插入语, 来表示后边要说的东西有趣.

the funny thing is, he's very bad at math.

1:
trade-in=n  以旧换新
trade in=v 以旧换新

I'm planning to do a trade-in with my old car
I'm planning to trade in my old car for a new one.

6,7,8:
it hardly ever did
几乎从来没有做过XX

It hardly ever had a problem. 
He hardly ever missed a day of work.(从不请假)

1,2,3,4,5:
how many miles on it?
跑了多少公里了.

改为陈述句是
It has XXX miles on it.

介词必须是on
